name: Chimp Memory
description:
A chimp has a better memory (working memory) of a human? Yes, check this game to test your working memory, that is the part of your brain that stores temporary informations.

To stop the music press 'm'

To start again press 'r'


To get the source code go here

https://github.com/formazione/chimp_memory

Visit my site for python (this program is made with python) tutorials and news.

https://pythonprogramming.altervista.org
